annotation.spannedText: Rabies vaccines are very safe, inexpensive and given infrequently if you follow the guidelines

classMention.mentionClass: Rabies vaccines are very safe, inexpensive and given infrequently if you follow the guidelines

annotation.spannedText: Talk to your vet and decide if your dog should get this protection based on potential exposure

classMention.mentionClass: Talk to your vet and decide if your dog should get this protection based on potential exposure

annotation.spannedText: Traditional medicine advocates that vaccines be given to ensure that an animal is protected against serious and fatal diseases, taking into account the potential risks of vaccination

classMention.mentionClass: Traditional medicine advocates that vaccines be given to ensure that an animal is protected against serious and fatal diseases, taking into account the potential risks of vaccination

annotation.spannedText: If enough of the population is not vaccinated, vaccine-preventable diseases will begin to occur

classMention.mentionClass: If enough of the population is not vaccinated, vaccine-preventable diseases will begin to occur

annotation.spannedText: you should think of your approach to vaccination as holistic but not selfish

classMention.mentionClass: you should think of your approach to vaccination as holistic but not selfish

annotation.spannedText: Consider the overall health of your pet, plus the risk factors, and go from there

classMention.mentionClass: Consider the overall health of your pet, plus the risk factors, and go from there

annotation.spannedText: Discuss vaccine protocols with your veterinarian

classMention.mentionClass: Discuss vaccine protocols with your veterinarian

annotation.spannedText: they have often paid for unnecessary vaccines

classMention.mentionClass: they have often paid for unnecessary vaccines

annotation.spannedText: If the veterinarian has not discussed “core” versus other vaccines with you, he or she has done you a disservice

classMention.mentionClass: If the veterinarian has not discussed “core” versus other vaccines with you, he or she has done you a disservice

annotation.spannedText: Vaccinations should not be picked from a shopping list

classMention.mentionClass: Vaccinations should not be picked from a shopping list

annotation.spannedText: You need to discuss pros and cons and tailor a health plan for your pet with your vet

classMention.mentionClass: You need to discuss pros and cons and tailor a health plan for your pet with your vet

annotation.spannedText: a sincere discussion about the pros and cons of Lyme vaccination is appropriate

classMention.mentionClass: a sincere discussion about the pros and cons of Lyme vaccination is appropriate

annotation.spannedText: Vaccinate when indicated and develop a complete wellness plan for your Snoopies, your Pumpkins, your Fidos and your Muffintops

classMention.mentionClass: Vaccinate when indicated and develop a complete wellness plan for your Snoopies, your Pumpkins, your Fidos and your Muffintops

annotation.spannedText: don’t let the preventable diseases bite.
